summary: Water is a simple yet essential compound, Hâ‚‚O, made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It's clear, odorless, and found everywhere on Earth. Water is life-giving; all living things need it, and it makes up most of Earth's hydrosphere. It exists as a solid (ice), liquid, or gas (steam/water vapor) due to its unique properties. We use water daily for agriculture, drinking, cooking, and industry. It's also crucial for transportation, cooling, and heating. Water's ability to dissolve many substances makes it a versatile solvent.
title: Water
